directions.text: Whisk the flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.
Add 4 TBSP butter, the cream and currants and mix until a dough consistency.
Knead dough and roll out into an 8″ square.
Cut biscuits in 3″ rounds and place ona  parchment lined baking sheet.
Brush tops with 2 TBSP melted butter and cook for 15 mins at 425°.
Let cool for 5 mins before serving.
